Metric.name: ClassLineCount
Metric.Description: Measures the number of lines in each class or interface.

Metric.name: CyclomaticComplexity
Metric.Description: Measures the (McCabe) Cyclomatic Complexity of source code. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyclomatic_complexity.

Metric.name: MethodLineCount
Metric.Description: Measures the number of lines in each method.
